x_symbol.description: Get and optionally set the element's z-index.

comment.author: mf
comment.note: Don't use this function, access the native property directly. This function is provided only for backwards-compatibility.

comment.author: mf
comment.note: I probably should return e.style.zIndex instead of parseInt(...) which will sometimes be NaN.

rev.author: mf
rev.note: put in it's own file for use with XC
